headline.main: A Clergyman Suspected of Poisoning His Wife.

docs.lead_paragraph: The people of this county and vicinity have been thrown into a high state of excitement on account of a minister of the Gospel being suspected of poisoning his wife. The circumstances of the case are as follows: The wife of the clergyman in question. residing near this place, died very suddenly on Tuesday evening last, she having previously been in good health, which excited suspicions.

headline.main: AFFAIRS AT ALBANY.; The Assembly Passes the Registry Bill, 85 to 21--The Appropriation Bill through the Assembly, the Hospitals and Dispensaries being left Out-The Quarantine Removal Bills--A Strange Proposition Coming to Quash all Effectual Quarantining--New Batch of Notaries, &c., &c.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Registry bill came up to-day for a third reading. Mr. TOMLINSON moved to recommit it, and then addressed the House for about half an hour in opposition to it. He hung about the line of his arguments a profusion of flowers, but did not damage the bill. Major SCHOLEFIELD responded happily, after which the motion to recommit was withdrawn and the Registry act carried by Yeas, 85 ; Nays, 21.

docs.snippet: The screw-steamship City of Washington, from Liverpool March 2, arrived here yesterday. Her news is of importance. The long-promised bill for a reform of parliamentary representation was introduced into the House of Commons on the 28th ult., Mr....
docs.lead_paragraph: The screw-steamship City of Washington, from Liverpool March 2, arrived here yesterday. Her news is of importance. The long-promised bill for a reform of parliamentary representation was introduced into the House of Commons on the 28th ult., Mr. DISRAELI, the Chancellor of the Exchequer, entering into an extended analysis of the measure.

docs.snippet: The Steamship City of Washington, now in her fourteenth day, had not made her appearance off Sandy Hook at 2 o'clock this morning. A northwest gale was blowing. The question of the Extra Session of Congress has not yet been decided by the President,...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Steamship City of Washington, now in her fourteenth day, had not made her appearance off Sandy Hook at 2 o'clock this morning. A northwest gale was blowing. The question of the Extra Session of Congress has not yet been decided by the President, though a conclusion will undoubtedly by arrived at before the sailing of the next California steamer.

docs.snippet: Mr. NOXON introduction a substitute for the bill relative to the Board of Health of New-York, some-what limiting the powers of the origination, and intended as a compromise. The Senate then refused to print Mr. SPINOLA'S report and testimony on the...
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. NOXON introduction a substitute for the bill relative to the Board of Health of New-York, some-what limiting the powers of the origination, and intended as a compromise. The Senate then refused to print Mr. SPINOLA'S report and testimony on the Metropolitan Police until the minority report was made.

headline.main: NEWS BY TELEGRAPH.; FROM WASHINGTON. The Grand Jury and the Sickies Case--Modifications in the Cass-Herran Treaty--The Count de Sartiges--M. Belly, &c.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Grand Jury have as yet brought in no bill. One is said to have been found against Mr. SICKLES, but differences exist as to Mr. BUTTERWORTH--a majority being opposed to any action as regards him, The Grand Jury have confined themselves entirely to witness present at the affray.

docs.snippet: The steamship City of Washington, from Liverpool on the 2d inst., with four days later European advices, is now about due at this port. This Sandy Hook Telegraph reported "no signs" at 11 o'clock last night. By way of Havana, we have details of news...
docs.lead_paragraph: The steamship City of Washington, from Liverpool on the 2d inst., with four days later European advices, is now about due at this port. This Sandy Hook Telegraph reported "no signs" at 11 o'clock last night. By way of Havana, we have details of news from Vera Cruz to Feb. 27. The city was in a state of siege;
